title: Is this a real video of the arrow that always points to the right?
subtitle: No computer-assisted manipulation was used to create this video of an arrow that always refers to the right, even when it rotates 180 degrees.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The visual illusion allows the three-dimensional arrow to appear as if it always points in the same direction (with its mirror mirror reflecting the opposite direction), even when it rotates 180 degrees.
